channel.title: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)
channel.description:
Hey, I just joined the forums and I've always wanted to make sigs and stuff in Graphics because I've always liked them. Gman7, who some of you may know has already made me a sig which kinda influenced me to want to start Graphics. Thanks a lot for the sig, I really liked it. It's my desktop picture =P
Anyways, I have never learned anything about doing Graphics except for a couple of stupid things I did in Paint which suck. I downloaded Gimp 2 and I know what TuTs are but I don't know how to start at all.
If anyone could help me, my Msn name is Supajin123@hotmail.com and i'll be on there after I get home from school which is about 3:30 until like 8ish. Weekends I"ll probably be on most of the time. If anyone can help me get started I'd greatly appreciate it Thanks

item.title: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:9, topic:184466”]I don’t think GIMP is good.

You won’t need to learn the WHOLE interfaces because as you go with a beginner tut, you’ll learn. So it’s funner and faster that way to learn.[/quote]

But every TuT I try I get stuck at some part and don’t know where the thing is. Or how to do something.

Read full topic

item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Thanks, I’ll work on it on Wednesday and Friday. Today and Tomrw, I gotta do a proj. Thursday gotta volunteer for some hours.

I’ll for sure finish that learning of the interface by the end of Friday night.
Thanks. I’ll post back on Wed/ Friday when i’m done and probably will ask more questions.

item.title: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

basically what that is saying is when you do File > Dialogs > Create New Dock > and click Layer, Channels & Paths

you may select the following options from the menu tab: Brushes, Patterns, Gradients, Tools, Tool Options

its just a way of adding extra menus so you dont have to keep re opening the same menu over and over

Read full topic
item.source: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)

item.title: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

That’s what I thought too.

A new window will appear, in this new window note the layer tab, in layers tab, in front of label Layers you can see a small button the left arraw, just click it and go through menus Add Tab and you will be shown a list of tool tabs, you only select Brushes, Patterns, Gradients, Tools, Tool Options.

I didn’t understand that step.

Read full topic
item.source: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)

what pictures you talking about like which step? ill give it a look[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 10:14:41 PM[/size][hr]Oh i see what your saying now. Ya the images are gone because im pretty sure that the site is having a problem with there uploader.

item.title: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

Wow, Tyvm. I can’t do the interface learning today cause I have to finish up hw but i’ll do it tomorrow after school before my friend comes over to do this project.

Thanks a lot =]. Gman said that you were a nice guy. And I can see that you are.

I’m gonna go try and finish up hw real fast and start. I’m excited now!! =D! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 04:06:36 PM[/size][hr]K Javis, I’ve tried doing the learning the Full Gimp Interface But I got stuck on one of the steps. Also, it’s cause I can’t see any of the pictures is why. Do they work for you?

Read full topic
item.source: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)

item.title: Newbie Needs Help with Graphics. HELP PLEASE :)
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

as a fellow gimper ill help ya m8. where to start where to start…

first go here and learn the whole interface of gimp. itll take aproxamatly 2 hours. cuz your completely new. The reason you must do this one is so you will know what people are talking about in there tuts.
http://www.gimptalk.com/forum/topic/tutorial-Learn-Full-Gimp-Interface-In-Half-An-Hour-20-1.html

now for some design tuts. Id recomend you start with ones that just use the gimp defaults to create a sig. The defaults are all explaind in the tut that i had provided above that i know you read
http://www.gimptalk.com/forum/topic/Defaults-Signature-Street-Fighter-7137-1.html
http://www.gimptalk.com/forum/topic/Defaults-Signature-Tutorial-8953-1.html
http://www.gimptalk.com/forum/topic/Iron-Man-Filters-defaults-Tut-9236-1.html
http://www.gimptalk.com/forum/topic/Defaults-Signature-Tutorial-10272-1.html
http://www.gimptalk.com/forum/topic/Defaults-Light-Burst-Signature-Tutorial-13644-1.html

now those will teach you how to create graphics with out having to download all the extra brushes ect. ill hook you up with some more difficult and in depth tuts a little later but right now its mid night and I have work tomarrow

Read full topic
